attributes.additional_details:
Our defence budget is the most inport thing to theis country. The government only spends a couple of percent of what the country earns on defence. This is wrong the defence to our country and over seas interest should be out NUMBER 1 priority. If we get over 100,000 signatures this will be spoken about in the house of commons.
Please share this as much as you can on Twitter Facebook, YouTube just your friends spread the word will help a lot.
